meanings.definition: Having or showing a strong desire for bloodshed or violence.
meanings.sent1: The lion was the bloodthirstiest creature in the jungle, always hunting for its next meal.
meanings.sent2: The vampire was known as the bloodthirstiest being in the town, feared by all.
meanings.sent3: The horror movie villain's bloodthirstiest nature made the audience jump in their seats.
meanings.sent4: The dictator's bloodthirstiest policies led to endless suffering for the people.
meanings.sent5: The warrior's eyes gleamed with the bloodthirstiest thirst for battle, ready to conquer any foe.

meanings.sent1: In the legends, the bloodthirstiest of all monsters was said to lurk in the dark caves.
meanings.sent2: The history books spoke of the bloodthirstiest ruler who conquered lands with ruthless tactics.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the title of the bloodthirstiest warrior was fierce among the knights.
meanings.sent4: The pirate captain was known as the bloodthirstiest on the high seas, striking fear into sailors' hearts.
meanings.sent5: Legends whispered of a creature, the bloodthirstiest of all, that haunted the forbidden forest.
